OrgName.entry: SOUTH YORKSHIRE FIRE AND RESCUE SERVICE

Desc.entry: Deals with all emergencies: fires, floods, road accidents, escape of dangerous substances, trapped people etc. Inspects places of work and storage for fire safety. Issues fire certificates to premises under the Fire Prevention Act 1971 and monitors risk assessment under the Fire Prevention (Workplace) Regulations 1997. Instructs adults and children in fire prevention. Issues Firework Licences.
